name: EditHubspotObject
description:
Partially update a HubSpot CRM object with specified properties.

This tool performs a partial update on a HubSpot CRM object identified by the `serviceId` or a unique property value using the `idProperty` query parameter. It overwrites provided properties while ensuring read-only or non-existent properties result in errors. Properties can be cleared with an empty string.

parameters.name: object_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier or `{serviceId}` for the object to be updated. This can be an internal object ID or a unique property value when used with `idProperty`.

parameters.name: object_properties_update
parameters.description: JSON object with key-value pairs representing the properties to be updated. Use empty strings to clear values.

properties.description: Key value pairs representing the properties of the object.

parameters.name: unique_property_name
parameters.description: The name of a unique property for the object, used instead of the internal ID if specified.

value_schema.description: The name of a property whose values are unique for this object

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the hubspot_crm API.

parameters.name: idProperty
parameters.description: The name of a property whose values are unique for this object

value_schema.description: The name of a property whose values are unique for this object

properties.description: Key value pairs representing the properties of the object.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
